title: Easy CD-DA Extractor Pro w/ Crack
description:
Easy CD-DA Extractor Professional 11.0.0 Build 1

Easy CD-DA Extractor aka "Swiss Army Knife Of Digital Audio" is ALL-IN-ONE software that copies Audio CDs, converts audio files from one format to another, edits metadata of audio files and can burn Audio CD, MP3 CD & DVD, and Data CD & DVD. Easy CD-DA Extractor supports all popular audio file formats such as 3G2, 3GP, MP1, MP2, MP3, Windows Media Audio (WMA), Ogg Vorbis (OGG), MP4, M4A (AAC and Apple Lossless), AAC, aacPlus (HE-AAC, AAC+, HE-AAC+PS, eAAC+), FLAC, Musepack (MPC), WavPack (WV), WAV, AIFF, Monkey&#039;s Audio (APE), CUE and M3U. 

Also, the Nero Digital (Nero AAC) is supported if you have the Nero Burning ROM installed on your computer. State-of-the-art audio encoding technology - Easy CD-DA Extractor includes the most advanced audio codec available, the aacPlus from the Coding Technologies. Additionally, Easy CD-DA Extractor also supports command line (.exe) encoders. Easy CD-DA Extractor compatible with Windows 2000, Windows XP (x86 and x64), Windows 2003, and Windows Vista (x86 and x64). Available in 30 languages. 

Easy CD-DA Extractor actually contains three separate programs: 
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ Audio CD Ripper - Copies audio CDs to selected audio format. 
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ Audio File Format Converter - Converts audio files from one format to another. 
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ CD/DVD Creator - Burns Audio CD, MP3 CD/DVD, Data CD/DVD, and DVD Video. 

Features of Easy CD-DA Extractor 11 : 
ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ Audio CD Ripper - Copies audio CDs to selected audio format. 
- Accurate, secure, high-performance CD ripping 
- Bypasses &#039;copy-protections&#039; 
- Reads bad condition CDs, reports possible errors 
- Get disc information / metadata from Internet 
- Edit or automatically fill metadata with Cover Art support 
- Supports CD-Text 
- Volume level control, Normalization, Fade In/Out, .... 

ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ Audio Converter - Converts audio files from one format to another. 
- Edit metadata of existing audio files 
- Edit or automatically fill metadata with Cover Art support 
- Volume level control, Normalization, Fade In/Out, .... 

ÃƒÂ¢?Ã‚Â¢ CD/DVD Creator - Burns Audio CD, MP3 CD/DVD, Data CD/DVD, and DVD Video. 
- Burns Audio CDs compatible with all home/car CD-players 
- Supports CD-Text 
- Supports Unicode and long filenames 
- Supports UDF, ISO/Joliet and DVD Video filesystems 

Easy CD-DA Extractor 11 adds MP3 DVD, Data DVD, and DVD Video burning and Metadata Editor. Easy CD-DA Extractor 11 also includes improved user interface, improved performance, improved Windows Explorer context menus, and bug fixes. 

Changes in Easy CD-DA Extractor 11 : 
- Added support for decoding and burning M4A/Apple Lossless files. 
- Fixed a bug that may have caused erroneous behavior of various components (Windows Explorer style controls, Drag &#039;n&#039; drop, Folder browse window, etc). 
- Fixed a bug in AAC/M4A/MP4 decoder. The bug may have caused a program crash when converting AAC, M4A, or MP4 files to other formats.
